entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who felt numb and cold. He is also referred to as 'he' in the conversation.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who had a conversation with Harry. He is also referred to as 'he' in the conversation.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned by Harry as someone who might have been more dangerous when older.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who tried to kill Harry as a baby. His information about the prophecy was incomplete.

entities.name: sibyll trelawney
entities.description: Sibyll Trelawney is mentioned as the one who chose the Hog's Head Inn for its cheapness and had a meeting with Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Voldemort tried to kill Harry as a baby, according to the prophecy.
Dumbledore met with Sibyll Trelawney at the Hog's Head Inn.
